#Correlations 

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(GGally)

names(data)

idaho <- data[data$state == 'ID', ]
View(idaho)

montana <- data[data$state == 'MT', ]
View(montana)

wyoming <- data[data$state == 'WY', ]
View(wyoming)
```
